entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS: ShellFlyoutRenderer setOverrideUserInterfaceStyle "unrecognized selector sent to instance" exception #17892

Closed

  • Android Crashing: "Java.Lang.RuntimeException: 'Canvas: trying to draw too large(109224768bytes) bitmap.'" Runs perfect on iOS/Windows. Any ideas why? #17862

PullRequests

Updated

  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, Under Consideration
